input_text.Prompt:

Mikasa Stephanie Iced Beverage Drinkware (Set of 4), 16 oz, Glass

Product keywords:
Exquisitely designed to befit the most prestigious audience
16-ounce capacity iced beverage, perfect for all beverages
The classic design brings elegance and charm to the table
Sized conveniently to meet the needs of every occasion
Dishwasher safe; hand-washing recommended
Lead-free
Curvy shape with narrow stems
Product description:

Product description:
input_text.Response A: Introducing the iCandy Combat Thermal Execution Targets Shooter Targets for Shooting Range Targets - the perfect addition to your shooting range! Made in the USA, these thick paper targets feature the iconic iCandy Combat design and are perfect for target practice. With a size of 13x19 inches, these targets are large enough to see from a distance and provide clear visibility. The thermal targets make it easy to see your marksmanship, even in low-light conditions. So why wait? Add the iCandy Combat Thermal Execution Targets to your shooting range today!
input_text.Response B: The Mikasa Stephanie Iced Beverage Drinkware is a set of 4 glasses that are perfect for any occasion. The classic design brings elegance and charm to the table, while the curvy shape with narrow stems respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic. The 16-ounce capacity iced beverage is perfect for all beverages. These glasses are sized conveniently to meet the needs of every occasion and are dishwasher safe; hand-washing recommended. Mikasa is a leading American dinnerware and accessories brand, offering a wide variety of patterns and styles for every taste.
